title: Fitch Downgrades U.S. Credit Rating: What Does It Mean?
description: Fitch Ratings, a globally recognized credit rating agency, has announced a downgrade of the United States’ Long-Term Foreign-Currency Issuer Default Rating (IDR) from ‘AAA’ to ‘AA+’. This decision is a reflection of several concerns surrounding the fiscal health and governance standards of the U.S. According to Fitch, the downgrade is primarily driven by the anticipated […]

title: ‘Calm Before the Rampage’ – Here’s a Sign That Bitcoin Is About To Go on a Huge Run, According to InvestAnswers
description:
